## not variable

Takes an existing matcher `match` and returns new matcher which inverts the result of `match`<!-- -->. I.e. If `match` returns `Match.FULL`<!-- -->, the new matcher returns `Match.FAIL` and vice versa. `Match.PARTIAL` results remain as is.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
not: <T, C, R>(match: Matcher<T, C, R>, success?: SeqCallback<T, C, R> | undefined, fail?: SeqCallback<T, C, R> | undefined) => Matcher<T, C, R>
```
